xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetughaṭanā
Upādinnattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetughaṭanā
94.
2799Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta…pe…  naaññamaññe cattāri…pe…  navipāke cattāri…pe…  nasampayutte cattāri, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2800(Yathā kusalattike anulomapaccanīyagaṇanā vibhattā, evaṃ gaṇetabbā.)
2801Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
<< Hetudukaup5.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
